TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseDataBoundControl extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl
Public MustInherit Class BaseDataBoundControl Inherits WebControl
public ref class BaseDataBoundControl abstract : System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebControl

summary.span: 充当控件的基类，这些控件使用 ASP.NET 数据源控件绑定到数据。

span.span: Serves as the base class for controls that bind to data using an ASP.NET data source control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支持控件体系结构，使 Web 服务器控件能够以一致的方式绑定到数据。ASP.NET supports a controls architecture that enables Web server controls to bind to data in a consistent fashion. 绑定到数据的 Web 服务器控件被称为数据绑定控件，而用于简化绑定的类称为数据源控件。Web server controls that bind to data are referred to as data-bound controls, and the classes that facilitate that binding are called data source controls. 设计为使用 ASP.NET 数据源控件的数据绑定控件派生自 control 类，该类定义基础数据绑定控件功能。Data-bound controls that are designed to use ASP.NET data source controls derive from the control class, which defines the base data-bound control functionality. 您可以使用随 ASP.NET 提供的数据绑定控件（包括 、 和 ）执行涉及显示数据的大多数 Web 开发任务。You can use the data-bound controls that are provided with ASP.NET, including , , and , to perform most Web development tasks that involve displaying data. 在这些控件未提供所需功能的情况下，你可以从基类继承， 并 实现你自己的自定义数据源控件。In scenarios in which these controls do not provide the functionality you need, you can inherit from the base and classes to implement your own custom data source control. 虽然支持和属性的任何 `DataSource` 类 `DataSourceID` 以及 `DataBind` 方法是数据绑定控件，但大多数 ASP.NET 数据绑定控件都扩展了抽象 和 类。While any class that supports the `DataSource` and `DataSourceID` properties and the `DataBind` method is a data-bound control, most ASP.NET data-bound controls extend the abstract and classes. 值得注意的异常包括 、 和 控件。Notable exceptions include , , and the controls. 有关数据绑定的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 数据访问内容映射](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/6759sth4(v=vs.100))。For more information about data binding, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/6759sth4(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于 类是抽象类，因此不能 直接创建对象。Because the class is abstract, you cannot create a object directly. 此构造函数通常由派生类的构造函数调用，用于初始化类中定义的属性 。This constructor is commonly called by the constructor of a derived class to initialize the properties defined in the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void ConfirmInitState() cil managed

summary.span: 设置数据绑定控件的初始化状态。

span.span: Sets the initialized state of the data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法设置数据绑定控件的初始化状态。The method sets the initialized state of the data-bound control. 方法由 类在其方法中调用 。The method is called by the class in its method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void DataBind() cil managed

summary.span: 将数据源绑定到调用的服务器控件及其所有子控件。

span.span: Binds a data source to the invoked server control and all its child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类将重写 方法，以标识数据绑定控件绑定到的数据源并生成适当的控件树。The class overrides the method to identify the data source that the data-bound control binds to and builds the appropriate control trees. 解析数据源时，由属性标识的数据源 优先。When resolving the data source, the data source identified by the property takes precedence. 如果 未设置，则使用由属性标识的对象 。If is not set, the object identified by the property is used. 此 `DataBind` 方法在派生自的所有 ASP.NET 数据绑定控件上是密封的 。The `DataBind` method is sealed on all ASP.NET data-bound controls derived from . 从和类派生的数据绑定 控件 应重写 `PerformDataBinding` 方法，而不是 方法来绑定数据。Data-bound controls derived from the and classes should override the `PerformDataBinding` method instead of the method to bind data. 如果 重写，则 和 事件将按顺序引发。If is overridden, the and events are raised out of order.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DataBound As EventHandler

summary.span: 在服务器控件绑定到数据源后发生。

span.span: Occurs after the server control binds to a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件通知服务器控件，为其编写的任何数据绑定逻辑都已完成。This event notifies the server control that any data binding logic written for it has completed. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

summary.span: 获取或设置对象，数据绑定控件从该对象中检索其数据项列表。

span.span: Gets or sets the object from which the data-bound control retrieves its list of data items.

value.span: 一个表示数据源的对象，数据绑定控件从该对象中检索其数据。

span.span: An object that represents the data source from which the data-bound control retrieves its data.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置 属性时，将 调用方法。When you set the property, the method is called. 此外，如果数据绑定控件已经初始化，则 调用方法以将 属性设置为 `true` 。In addition, if the data-bound control has already been initialized, the method is called to set the property to `true`. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 使用数据绑定控件的属性。The following code example demonstrates how the property of a data-bound control is used. 在此示例中，将 控件绑定到 对象。In this example, the control is bound to a object. 设置属性后， 显式调用方法。After the property is set, the method is called explicitly. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewDataBind#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDataBind/CS/gridviewdatabindcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewDataBind#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDataBind/VB/gridviewdatabindvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置控件的 ID，数据绑定控件从该控件中检索其数据项列表。

span.span: Gets or sets the ID of the control from which the data-bound control retrieves its list of data items.

value.span: 表示数据源的控件的 ID，数据绑定控件从该控件中检索其数据。

span.span: The ID of a control that represents the data source from which the data-bound control retrieves its data.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果数据绑定控件已经初始化 ( 调用方法或 处理事件) 在设置 属性时，将 调用方法，这会将 属性设置为 `true` 。If the data-bound control has already been initialized (the method is called or event is handled) when you set the property, the method is called, which sets the property to `true`. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 使用数据绑定控件的属性。The following code example demonstrates how the property of a data-bound control is used. 通过将控件的 属性设置为 "AuthorsSqlDataSource"，控件的 ID 将控件关联到控件 。The control is associated to the control by setting its property to "AuthorsSqlDataSource", the ID of the control. 如果 将属性设置 (而不是 属性) ，则在运行时，数据绑定控件将自动绑定到数据源控件。When the property is set (instead of the property), the data-bound control automatically binds to the data source control at run time. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSimple/CS/displaycustomers.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewSimple/VB/displaycustomers.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 如果设置了 属性且数据绑定控件标记为需要绑定，则调用 方法。

span.span: Calls the method if the property is set and the data-bound control is marked to require binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法 在方法中调用 ， 如果数据绑定控件尚未绑定，则调用方法。The method is called during the method, to call the method if the data-bound control is not yet bound. 这种行为方式与 中的类（如） ( 派生) 和类的行为方式相同 。This is the same behavior pattern that the (from which classes such as are derived) and classes follow. 在 `EnsureDataBound` 调用和方法的过程中，还可以调用方法 `CreateChildControls` `LoadPostData` 。The `EnsureDataBound` method might also be called during calls to `CreateChildControls` and `LoadPostData` methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 方法都将属性显式设置 为 `true` 。The and methods both explicitly set the property to `true`. 方法由 方法调用，而在 引发事件时调用。The method is called by the method, while is called when the event is raised. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个属于派生的数据绑定控件类的属性。The following code example shows a property that belongs to a derived data-bound control class. 该示例演示在 数据绑定控件初始化之后，如果用于标识数据源的属性发生了更改，数据绑定控件如何调用方法。The example demonstrates how a data-bound control can call the method if a property that identifies a data source is changed after the data-bound control is initialized. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件（如 、 、 和） 使用 属性来确定数据绑定控件是否绑定到 ASP.NET 2.0 数据源控件，例如 或 。Controls such as , , , and use the property to determine whether the data-bound control is bound to an ASP.NET 2.0 data source control, such as an or . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示派生的 数据绑定控件类如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how the property is used by a derived data-bound control class. 在方法实现中使用属性 来确定是否 应引发事件。The property is used in the method implementation to determine whether the event should be raised. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件使用 属性，或如果控件使用 `SelectMethod` 、 `UpdateMethod` 、 `DeleteMethod` 或 `InsertMethod` 属性进行数据绑定，数据绑定将自动进行。Data binding is automatic if the control uses the property or if the control uses `SelectMethod`, `UpdateMethod`, `DeleteMethod`, or `InsertMethod` properties for data binding.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDataBound(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnDataBound (e As EventArgs)
abstract member OnDataBound : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnDataBound : EventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件数据的 对象。

span.span: An object that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通知服务器控件任何与该控件关联的数据绑定逻辑都已完成。This method notifies a server control that any data binding logic associated with the control has completed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此 方法在派生自的所有控件上是密封的 。The method is sealed on all controls derived from . 数据绑定控件应重写 `PerformDataBinding` ，而不是 绑定数据的方法。Data-bound controls should override `PerformDataBinding` instead of the method to bind data. 如果 重写，则 和 事件将按顺序引发。If is overridden, the and events are raised out of order. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 使用方法 通过派生的数据绑定控件类引发事件。The following code example demonstrates how the method is used to raise the event by a derived data-bound control class. 使用 和 方法将数据绑定到控件后，数据绑定控件将引发事件，以指示 数据绑定已完成。After using the and methods to bind data to the control, the data-bound control raises the event to signal that data binding is complete. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/CS/textboxset.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/VB/textboxset.vb#3)]

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写时，请确保调用基类的 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: Rebinds the data-bound control to its data after one of the base data source identification properties changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 、 或 `DataMember` 属性值在页面事件发生之后的任何时间更改时，将调用方法 。The method is called when the , , or `DataMember` property value changes any time after the page's event has occurred. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个属于派生的数据绑定控件类的属性。The following code example shows a property that belongs to a derived data-bound control class. 该示例演示在 数据绑定控件初始化之后，如果用于标识数据源的属性发生了更改，数据绑定控件如何调用方法。The example demonstrates how a data-bound control can call the method if a property that identifies a data source is changed after the data-bound control is initialized. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/CS/textboxset.cs#7)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/VB/textboxset.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法首先调用基类 方法，然后调用 方法来处理 事件。The method first calls the base class method, and then calls the method to handle the event. 此外，如果对页的 HTTP 请求为回发并启用了视图状态，则此 方法会将 属性设置为 `true` 。Additionally, if the HTTP request to the page is a post back and view state is enabled, the method sets the property to `true`.

summary.span: 在加载数据绑定控件之前设置该控件的初始化状态。

span.span: Sets the initialized state of the data-bound control before the control is loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件处理程序用于控制在页面的生命周期内何时发生数据绑定。The event handler is used to control when data binding occurs within the life cycle of the page. 它通过设置数据绑定控件的内部初始化状态来实现此功能。It does this by setting the internal initialized state of the data-bound control. 由于控件的已初始化状态是在 页面生命周期的阶段中设置的，因此 只要在该阶段后更改控件的数据属性，就会调用事件处理程序，以指示控件在呈现之前必须重新绑定到其数据。Because the control's initialized state is set during the phase of the page's lifecycle, the event handler is called any time a data property of the control is changed after that phase, to signal that the control must re-bind to its data before rendering.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, controls how data is retrieved and bound to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生类型重写此方法以从数据源中检索数据。Derived types override this method to retrieve data from a data source.

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应调用 方法。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the method should be called.

value.span: 如果在呈现控件之前应调用数据绑定控件的方法，则返回值为 ; 否则，值为 。

span.span: The returned value is if the data-bound control's method should be called before the control is rendered; otherwise, the value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在 `true` 数据绑定控件已经开始向页面呈现其输出时将属性设置为，则当前 HTTP 请求不是回调，并且你正在使用 属性来标识要绑定到的数据源控件，将 立即调用方法。If you set the property to `true` when the data-bound control has already begun to render its output to the page, the current HTTP request is not a callback, and you are using the property to identify the data source control to bind to, the method is called immediately. 在这种情况下， 属性实际不会设置为 `true` 。In this case, the property is not actually set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示派生的 数据绑定控件类如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how the property is used by a derived data-bound control class. 使用方法检索数据并将 其绑定到控件后 ， 属性将设置为 `false` ，并 调用方法以指示控件已完成绑定，而在当前页的生命周期中不再需要此属性。After data is retrieved by the method and bound to the control with the method, the property is set to `false` and the method is called to signal that the control has completed binding and no longer requires this property during the current page's lifecycle. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/CS/textboxset.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/VB/textboxset.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SupportsDisabledAttribute As Boolean
public: virtual property bool SupportsDisabledAttribute { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示在控件的 属性为 时，控件是否应将呈现的 HTML 元素的 特性设置为 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果 属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于 4.0，则为; 否则为 。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示在控件被禁用时 ASP.NET 应如何呈现控件的 HTML。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为 `true` ，则 `disabled` 在禁用控件时，ASP.NET 将呈现属性。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为 `false` ，则 `class` 在禁用控件时，ASP.NET 将呈现属性。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

span.span: The object to verify.

param.span: 通常是 、、 或 的实例。

span.span: Typically an instance of , , , or .

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，验证数据绑定控件绑定到的对象是它可以使用的对象。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, verifies that the object a data-bound control binds to is one it can work with.

para.span: 此 方法仅在 属性的类的赋值函数 (setter) 中调用 。

span.span: The method is only called in the class's mutator (setter) for the property.

para.span: 派生类实现方法以检查为属性设置的对象的类型 ，以确保数据绑定控件可以使用该类型。

span.span: Derived classes implement the method to check the type of the object that is set for the property, to ensure that the data-bound control can work with the type.

para.span: 如果该类型无法识别，则派生类型实现将引发异常。

span.span: If the type is not recognized, derived type implementations throw an exception.
